node.title: Perth mother killed two young daughters because she didn't want to leave them behind, court heard
node.alt: Two young sisters smile for the camera.
node.description: A Perth woman who killed her two young daughters before attempting to take her own life should not be held criminally responsible for the deaths because she was not of sound mind, a court has heard.
node.content:
["A Perth woman decided to kill her two young daughters before attempting to take her own life\u00a0after seeing the tags on their schoolbags and thinking they looked like ones from the morgue, the WA Supreme Court has heard.", "WARNING: This story contains content that some people may find distressing.", "Milka Djurasovic is facing a judge-alone\u00a0trial\u00a0on charges of murdering 10-year-old Mia and six-year-old\u00a0Tiana at the family's home in northern Perth suburb of Madeley in October 2019.", "While it is ultimately for Justice Stephen Hall to decide, both the prosecution and the defence are submitting that the 40-year-old should not be held criminally responsible for the deaths because she was not of sound mind and did not have the capacity to know that she ought not do what she did.", "The court has heard Ms Djurasovic's mental health started to decline in the months leading up to the killings, and she stopped eating, started having panic attacks and was struggling with anxiety.", "She was also sleeping a lot, not participating in family events, including her two daughters' birthday celebrations, and had expressed concern to her husband about what would happen if she ended up in a mental hospital.", "
Mother 'didn't see a way out', lawyer says
", "Prosecutor\u00a0Justin Whalley said Ms Djurasovic's family arranged for her to see both a psychologist and a psychiatrist and while she was prescribed anti-depressants, her husband became concerned she was not taking them.\u00a0", "She also typed what Mr Whalley described as as \"a statement of regret\", in which she talked about killing herself and said she was \"sorry for everything\" but \"didn't see a way out.\"", "", "
The little girls' deaths sent shock waves through the suburb of Madeley.(ABC News: Emily Piesse)
", "After the killings Ms Djurasovic told psychiatrists that\u00a0while she had decided to kill herself, she also thought she could not leave her children behind.", "On the morning of October 25, 2019, the court heard Ms Djurasovic decided \"today's the day\" after seeing the tags on her daughters' school bags and thinking they looked like morgue tags.", "She put knives, a machete and ropes she had purchased earlier in the pantry,\u00a0but Tiana saw them and started crying and saying she wanted to go to school.", "She drove the girls there and\u00a0parked near the office but when Mia said she wanted to go inside, Ms Djurasovic locked the doors and drove home.", "Mr Whalley said about and hour and a half later\u00a0she decided to kill the girls and herself.", "
Eldest daughter struggled with mother before she was killed
", "Tiana was killed first while Mia, who the court heard had struggled with her mother, was killed second.", "Ms Djurasovic then kissed and the girls before repeatedly trying to kill herself.", "When she did not succeed, she recorded a video on her phone in which blood could be seen on her face.", "\"I'm sorry everyone...please let me die, it's all my fault. I'm sorry everyone, sorry, sorry, sorry, sorry.\"\u00a0", "Ms Djurasovic then left the house before her husband arrived and found Mia's body in the pantry and Tiana in her bedroom.", "His wife, who had again attempted to take her own life, was found in the sand dunes at Whitfords beach.", "She was sobbing and said to police \"I just want to die.\"", "A search of the family home found a number of notes in which Ms Djurasovic said she loved her girls\u00a0\"more than anything.\"", "Another note said \"I am at fault for everything ... I can't have them grow up without me. \"", "\"I did nothing bad on purpose.\"", "
Ms Djurasovic was suffering from 'major depressive disorder'
", "Today Ms Djurasovic was briefly called to the stand to tesitfy at the trial, but she was only asked to confirm the facts had been read to the court were correct, which she did.", "", "
The girls were found dead by their father in the family home when he returned home from work.(ABC News: Emily Piesse)
", "Forensic psychiatrist, Adam Brett, examined Ms Djurasovic's medical file and interviewed her after the killings.", "He testified in court that he had concluded at the time she was suffering from \"a major depressive disorder with possibly psychotic features\",\u00a0which deprived her of the capacity to know that she ought not do\u00a0what she did.", "Dr\u00a0Brett said Ms Djurasovic's depression was so bad, she believed her daughters would be put in state care if she was not there, and she did not want to leave them in in the \"awful world\" that she had left behind.", "\"(She acted) in almost a crime of passion for her children,\" Dr Brett said.", "\"She was trying to save them from the pain she was in.", "\"She loved them so much she didn't want them to suffer as she was.", "\"She was killing her children to save them from her fate.\"\u00a0"]
